keyword: how many calories are in a mcdouble
title: How Many Calories Are in a McDouble?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a McDouble from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a McDouble?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's McDouble burger: two beef patties, one cheese slice, pickles, onions, ketchup, mustard, on a bun; as served without modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data. Check app or packaging for latest.

quick_answer.text: A standard McDouble contains 390 calories with 23 g protein and 34 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a McDouble?
What's the protein in a McDouble?
faqs.a: About 23 g of protein per McDouble.

faqs.q: Does a McDouble have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 800 mg of sodium per burger.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a McDouble?
faqs.a: Approximately 34 g of carbohydrates, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is the McDouble lower calorie than a Big Mac?
faqs.a: Yes, at 390 kcal vs. about 590 kcal for a Big Mac.
